description: The gender of the students, indicating male or female.
The percentage of students who graduated on time within a specified demographic or subgroup.
The percentage of students who left school without completing their education within a specified demographic or subgroup.
Demographic or socioeconomic subgroup including race, disability status, income level, foster care status, homelessness, etc.
The year for which the graduation and dropout data is reported, specifically 2021 in this analysis.
